Version 0.6 - July 26, 2010
===========================
- Added version number in preparation to the system info extension.


Version 0.5.6 - June 22, 2010
=============================
- Improved insert_or_update() to override all values if the record exists.


Version 0.5.5 - June 7, 2010
============================
- Initial version, moved from tipfy.ext.auth.
